name: Basement With Ladder Leading Upward

args: There's a rug covering the opening in the ceiling. You'd have to move it first.

description: You're in a stone basement. The basement continues to the east where the worked stone gives way to a natural cavern. A ladder leads upward to the ceiling.

features.roomDesc: ifFlagWrite|!G.LABRUGMOVED|There's a brown rug covering the opening above the ladder. It would be easily moved.
move: You climb part way up the ladder and push the rug to the side. You could now go upward into whatever is above you.
